analyzed: con gyi phyag rgya gnyis bcings te sbyar la bza'o //
translated: Having formed the two mudras of the wrathful index finger and mace, one should eat while joining them.

original: khro bo'i lta ba yang bya zhing yid kyang khro bor bya'o //
analyzed: khro bo'i lta ba yang bya zhing yid kyang khro bor bya'o //
translated: One should also have the wrathful gaze, and be wrathful in mind.

original: rab tu dpa' ba sren dang bcas //
analyzed: rab tu dpa' ba sren dang bcas //
translated: One should be very heroic, with pride,

original: rtsal gyis gnon par rab tu 'dul //
analyzed: rtsal gyis gnon par rab tu 'dul //
translated: subduing with power, well-disciplined.

original: zhes pa mthu rtsal chen po dang / dpa' bo cis kyang mi bzlog pa'i sren dang bcas pa'i tshul du gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa mthu rtsal chen po dang / dpa' bo cis kyang mi bzlog pa'i sren dang bcas pa'i tshul du gnas par bya'o //
translated: As stated, one should stand in the manner of having great strength and power, and the pride of a hero who cannot be turned back by anything.

original: sngags sngon bzhin du sngags tshul gnas //
analyzed: sngags sngon bzhin du sngags tshul gnas //
translated: One should abide in the manner of mantra, as before with the mantra.

original: gang 'dod pa ni gzhom par bya //
analyzed: gang 'dod pa ni gzhom par bya //
translated: One should kill whatever one desires.

original: zhes pa sngar bshad pa bshad du khro bo'i sku yang bsgyur zhing 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi gnas gsum po'i sngags pa yang tshul bzhin du gnas te sgrub pa pos gang 'dod pa de gsad par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa sngar bshad pa bshad du khro bo'i sku yang bsgyur zhing 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi gnas gsum po'i sngags pa yang tshul bzhin du gnas te sgrub pa pos gang 'dod pa de gsad par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: The meaning of this verse is as follows: The mantra practitioner should transform his body into that of a wrathful deity, and should stand in the three places of the wheel, and should kill whatever he desires.

original: drag shul can brkyang ste bzhag ces pa g-yon brkyang ba'i tshul du gnas par bya'o //üîΩbzur te 'dug pa'i tshul du gnas //
analyzed: drag shul can brkyang ste bzhag ces pa g-yon brkyang ba'i tshul du gnas par bya'o // bzur te 'dug pa'i tshul du gnas //
translated: The phrase standing with the left leg extended means that he should stand in the manner of extending the left leg.

original: zhes pa g-yas logs su bzur ba'i tshul du gnas par bya'o //üîΩgdong yang g-yon par bsgyur par bya //
analyzed: zhes pa g-yas logs su bzur ba'i tshul du gnas par bya'o // gdong yang g-yon par bsgyur par bya //
translated: The phrase standing in the manner of turning to the right means that he should stand in the manner of turning to the right.

original: zhes ba g-yas logs su gdong yang gcus te gnas par bya'o //üîΩmdzub mo bsgrengs te gdongs pa dang // zhes pa brang du bsgreng zhes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes ba g-yas logs su gdong yang gcus te gnas par bya'o // mdzub mo bsgrengs te gdongs pa dang // zhes pa brang du bsgreng zhes pa'o //
translated: The phrase turning the face to the left means that he should stand with his face turned to the left.üîΩThe phrase pointing the index finger to the chest means that he should point the index finger to the chest.

original: g-yas pa be con gyi phyag rgya dag gis bsdigs zhes pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa be con gyi phyag rgya dag gis bsdigs zhes pa'o //
translated: The phrase threatening with the right hand in the mudra of the club means that he should threaten with the right hand in the mudra of the club.

original: de nas rkang pa mnyam par gzhag / ces pa rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du gung mo mtho gang gi bar du gzhag go //
analyzed: de nas rkang pa mnyam par gzhag / ces pa rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du gung mo mtho gang gi bar du gzhag go //
translated: Then, the feet evenly placed means that the two feet are placed with the space of a thumb in between.

original: yan lag g-yas pa mtho bar bya //
analyzed: yan lag g-yas pa mtho bar bya //
translated: The right limb is raised.

original: zhes pa lag pa g-yas pa be con gyi phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: zhes pa lag pa g-yas pa be con gyi phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: The right hand is bound in the club mudra.

original: mtho bar phyar la dpung bstod do //
analyzed: mtho bar phyar la dpung bstod do //
translated: It is raised high and the arm is extended.

original: dpal dang ldan zhing zhes sngags pa'i yon tan la bya'o //
analyzed: dpal dang ldan zhing zhes sngags pa'i yon tan la bya'o //
translated: Endowed with glory refers to the qualities of the mantra practitioner.

original: g-yon pa smad ces pa g-yon logs kyi dpung pa smad do //
analyzed: g-yon pa smad ces pa g-yon logs kyi dpung pa smad do //
translated: The left is lowered, meaning that the left arm is lowered.

original: zhi par 'dod na zhi bar 'gyur //
analyzed: zhi par 'dod na zhi bar 'gyur //
translated: If one desires peace, there will be peace.

original: zhes tshul de ltar gnas pas zhi ba' las bsgrubs pas zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes tshul de ltar gnas pas zhi ba' las bsgrubs pas zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By abiding in that way and accomplishing the peaceful activity, there will be peace.

original: phyed ni dma' bar bkug ste gnas //
analyzed: phyed ni dma' bar bkug ste gnas //
translated: The other half is lowered and placed.

original: zhes pa rkang pa g-yas tsham dam byed pa nyid cung zad tsam pa bkug pa'i tshul du gnas pa ni phyed dma' bar bkug pa ste de ni tsham dam mo //
analyzed: zhes pa rkang pa g-yas tsham dam byed pa nyid cung zad tsam pa bkug pa'i tshul du gnas pa ni phyed dma' bar bkug pa ste de ni tsham dam mo //

original: rkang ba g-yas pa tsham dam byed //
analyzed: rkang ba g-yas pa tsham dam byed //
translated: The right foot is stamped.

original: ces pa g-yas logs dma' bar bya zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa g-yas logs dma' bar bya zhes pa'o //

original: sngags tshul gnas pas bsgrubs na ni //
analyzed: sngags tshul gnas pas bsgrubs na ni //
translated: If one abides in the manner of mantra, one accomplishes.

original: zhes pa sngags bsnol ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa'i gnas la sngags bris pa la gnas te zhes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa sngags bsnol ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa'i gnas la sngags bris pa la gnas te zhes pa'o //
translated: This means that one abides in the location of the six-spoked wheel of combined mantras, and writes the mantras there.

original: rgyas par 'dod na thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: rgyas par 'dod na thob par 'gyur //
translated: If one desires increase, one will obtain.

original: zhes @279b ba tshul 'di ltar gnas pas rgyas pa'i las byan rgyas bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes @279b ba tshul 'di ltar gnas pas rgyas pa'i las byan rgyas bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: This means that if one abides in this manner, one will perform the activity of increase and there will be increase.

original: slar yang de bzhin shes bya ba //
analyzed: slar yang de bzhin shes bya ba //
translated: Again, one should know it as such.

original: bzlog ste bya yi gzhan du min //üîΩzhes pa 'di ni tshig gi rgyan tsam du zad de sngags bsnol ba'am /
analyzed: bzlog ste bya yi gzhan du min // zhes pa 'di ni tshig gi rgyan tsam du zad de sngags bsnol ba'am /

original: bzlog pa'i las drug po la tsham ngam 'di drug rim bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: bzlog pa'i las drug po la tsham ngam 'di drug rim bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: This is merely an ornament of words. One should combine these six mudras with the six activities of combined mantras or reversals.

original: gzhan la ni mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzhan la ni mi sbyor ro //
translated: One should not combine them with others.

original: tshigs bcad gong ma dang sbyar na snga ma'i las tha mal ba drug po la sbyar ba skad du bshad do //

analyzed: tsham ngam 'di dag drag po la sbyar bar rigs zhes kha cig 'chad do //

original: bsgrub pa bdag nyid chen po yi //
analyzed: bsgrub pa bdag nyid chen po yi //

original: zhes pa bsgrub pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa de'i zhi bar 'gyur zhes ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa bsgrub pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa de'i zhi bar 'gyur zhes ba'o //

original: tsham dam rigs drug gsungs pa zhes pa las drug la go rims bzhin du tsham ngam drug gsungs pa /
analyzed: tsham dam rigs drug gsungs pa zhes pa las drug la go rims bzhin du tsham ngam drug gsungs pa /
translated: The six mudras are taught in the Six Mudras Tantra.

original: dang po'i ming ni legs par phyogs //
analyzed: dang po'i ming ni legs par phyogs //
translated: The first is called ‚Äúwell-directed.‚Äù

original: zhes pa dbang gi las kyi tsham ngam dang por gsungs pa de'i ming ni legs par phyogs zhes bya ste gang dbang du bya ba de bdag la phyogs shing dga' bar bya ba bsgrub pa'i phyir tsham ngam de'i ming yang de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: zhes pa dbang gi las kyi tsham ngam dang por gsungs pa de'i ming ni legs par phyogs zhes bya ste gang dbang du bya ba de bdag la phyogs shing dga' bar bya ba bsgrub pa'i phyir tsham ngam de'i ming yang de skad ces bya ste /
translated: This is the first mudra of the activity of power. Its name is ‚Äúwell-directed‚Äù because it is directed toward oneself and is accomplished for the sake of delighting the one who is to be magnetized.

original: tsham ngam 'di drug char gyi ming las kyi don dang / rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan nyid can sha stag go //
analyzed: tsham ngam 'di drug char gyi ming las kyi don dang / rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan nyid can sha stag go //
translated: The names of these six mudras are all based on the meaning of the activity.

original: de yi 'og ma rgyab kyis phyogs //
analyzed: de yi 'og ma rgyab kyis phyogs //
translated: The next one is called ‚Äúturned away.‚Äù

original: zhes pa 'khon par bya ba'i tsham ngam gyi ming khro bo can zhes pa gsad pa'i tsham dam gyi ming ngo //
analyzed: zhes pa 'khon par bya ba'i tsham ngam gyi ming khro bo can zhes pa gsad pa'i tsham dam gyi ming ngo //
translated: This is the mudra of the activity of enmity. The name of the mudra of the activity of killing is ‚Äúangry.‚Äù

original: bzhi pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng ba yin //
analyzed: bzhi pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng ba yin //
translated: The fourth is the raised index finger.

original: zhes pa bskrad par bya ba'i tsham dam gyi ming ngo //
analyzed: zhes pa bskrad par bya ba'i tsham dam gyi ming ngo //
translated: This is the name of the spell for banishing.
